## InvalidAddressError class

Error that may get thrown if an invalid address was passed

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare class InvalidAddressError extends Error 
```
<b>Extends:</b> Error

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `InvalidAddressError` class.
